entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:45 PM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
